alert.note: Alert for Loess Plains; Loup Rivers Basin (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 22 at 9:48AM CDT until October 23 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 7 PM CDT SUNDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 209 AND 219... The National Weather Service in North Platte has upgraded the Fire Weather Watch to a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from Noon to 7 PM CDT Sunday. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zone 209 Loup Rivers Basin and Fire Weather Zone 219 Loess Plains. * TIMING...Sunday Noon to 7 PM CDT. * WINDS...Southwest 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Between 15 and 20 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs in the lower to mid 80s. * LIGHTNING...Not anticipated. * IMPACTS...Any fire start will likely spread rapidly and be very difficult to control. Extreme fire behavior is possible.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
